source:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Scouts must excel in keeping themselves hidden, but when even their own comrades cannot locate them, there is surely trouble afoot.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
キャンプ・ブロークングラスのタロン少闘士は、どこか落ち着かない様子だ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TODO_00<tab>Search for the wounded contingent scout.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the wounded contingent scout.

target: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TODO_02<tab>負傷したガレマルド市民を救助

TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_000ちょっと頼みたいことがあるんだけど、
話を聞いてくれないかい？

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_001<tab>A friend who was sent out on reconnaissance has been gone far too long, and she's not responding to her linkpearl.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_001偵察に出た仲間の帰りが遅くてね。
リンクパール通信も繋がらず、心配しているんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_002<tab>Will you help me look for her?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_002何か問題が起きたのかもしれない。
自分と手分けして、捜索を手伝ってもらえないだろうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_003<tab>I knew you would! Let's split up─I'll search around the camp, while you head for the lake.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_003協力してくれるか、感謝する！
自分はキャンプ近辺から捜索を開始してみる。
君は大セルレア湖方面で「派遣団の偵察兵」を探してくれ！

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_004<tab>If this doesn't work, we'll have to cast the net a bit wider.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_004自分はキャンプ近辺から捜索を開始してみる。
君は大セルレア湖方面で「派遣団の偵察兵」を探してくれ！

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_010<tab>Thank goodness you're here. Never mind me, this man is in desperate need of aid!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_010助かったよ……！
それほど深い傷ではないので、自分は大丈夫！
それより、彼を介抱してあげて……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDCITIZEN04222_000_020<tab>I thought he could use my help, so I called out to him, but he soon bolted in fear. That's when one of these fiends appeared out of nowhere and pounced on him.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDCITIZEN04222_000_020湖畔で彼のことを見つけて、
声をかけたんだけど、逃げてしまったの。
それで、追いかけてみたら獣に襲われていて……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_021<tab>Although I rushed to fend it off, it had already signaled to its pack mates. Then, just as they had me on the back foot, you arrived.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_021助けに入ったんだけど、
獣に仲間を呼ばれちゃって、危ないところだったのよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_022<tab>I would've called for assistance if my hands weren't already full. But thanks to your timely intervention, I can finally send for troops to take this poor fellow to safety.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_022キャンプに連絡を取りたかったんだけど、
彼のことをかばったままだと、隙をつくのが難しくて……。
来てくれて助かったわ、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_023<tab>I'll move him to a more secure location until our comrades get here. While you and I are both perfectly capable of conveying the situation via linkpearl, perhaps it would set their minds at ease if you could also speak to them in person?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_023応援が来るまで、建物の陰に隠れていようと思うから、
キャンプへの報告をお願いしてもいいかしら？
悪いけど、よろしくね……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_024<tab>Once he's caught his breath, I'll get him out of the open. I'm sure there's a good hiding place nearby.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_024応援が来るまで、建物の陰に隠れていようと思うから、
キャンプへの報告をお願いしてもいいかしら？
悪いけど、よろしくね……！

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_030<tab>Gods be good! I'll dispatch troops at once!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_030そんなことになっていたなんて……！
報告ありがとう、さっそく応援を送るとしよう！

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_031<tab>We're lucky you got there when you did, though I wonder what drew that civilian to such a dangerous place to begin with. Perhaps he was in search of supplies?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_031それにしても、あんなところに市民がいるだなんて。
もしかして、隠れていた場所で燃料が尽きてしまって、
代わりとなるものを探しに来ていたのかもな……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_032<tab>I doubt he'd find much food in that particular area, so it must've been fuel he was after. If I were him, I'd try that enormous extraction facility on the lake, but it sounds like he was hoping to get ceruleum from the water itself.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_032湖底の青燐泉から湧く青燐水を採集するか、あるいは、
水上リグに侵入できれば、確保できるかもしれないと、
試していた可能性は考えられる。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_033<tab>Seems like a tricky task at the best of times, although I expect the folks around those parts have their methods. If so, they could probably stay holed up for months on end, providing there's enough food to go around.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_033ただ、実際は湖水から、すぐそのまま、
燃料に使えたりはしないのだが。
それほど、追い詰められていたのかもな……。

source: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_034<tab>Well, the main thing is that he and my friend are no longer in any danger. I see now you're every bit the hero people say you are, not that I ever doubted it!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_034とにかく、あなたが見つけてくれて助かった！
これからも市民の救助に尽力していこうと思う！
